data.name: Modesto-Berkeley DevFest 2019
data.description: Hey GDGers, we know October is a long ways out, but we’re super excited to bring you the first DevFest to be hosted in Modesto (and our second partnering with GDG Berkeley)! Location is TBD, but the date will be October 19, 2019 so mark your calendars now and get ready for a day full of awesome tech…

data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: Adulting.Dev
relatedRecords.description: Adulting.Dev is a one day conference for professionals developers who have recently started their careers and the managers and team leads who support them. The conference will cover topics across three themes - learning, living and leveling-up. This isn’t your typical tech conference - we’re not tal…

relatedRecords.name: Stir Trek
relatedRecords.description: Stir Trek is a one-day conference in Columbus, Ohio focused on teaching software developers the latest and greatest in technologies, techniques, and tools. The full day of content is always concluded with a private screening of a blockbuster film on its opening day.

relatedRecords.name: CFS  - Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest: Big Data & Analytics Conference
relatedRecords.description:
Hello Everyone!
We are pleased to announce that registration is open for “Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest”, a 1-day event on Friday, April 17, 2020, 9:00AM to 5:00PM at the Microsoft offices at 12012 Sunset Hills Road, Reston,VA., 20190. We will be in Rooms 3028, 3054, 3058, and 3062.
